A. Martini
B. William Sedgwick
C. Hamnet Sedlak
D. Gordon Rowell
 Output:
questions.system_answer: {"answer":"B. William Sedgwick","reasoning":"The symbol “3HS wM” is a stylized cryptic clue that, when decoded, points to the name William Sedgwick.  The “3” can be read as a stylized “W”, “HS” corresponds to the middle letters of “Sedgwick”, and the trailing “wM” hints at the “W‑M” pattern found in the surname.  None of the other options fit the pattern of the clue as neatly as William Sedgwick does."}
